pr_title: REST endpoint and tests for data stream migration

timeline.message: REST endpoint and tests for data stream migration

timeline.bodyText: I think change to 7.10.99 after backport should be change to 7.9.99 after backport?
timeline.author: martijnvg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,69 @@

+"Migrate to data stream":

replies.bodyText: I don't think the migrate feature will be available until the 7.11 release?
replies.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: 🤦 true, I somehow always think the feature makes it into the 7.10 release :)
